title: BRIEF-Bharti Airtel Says Sept Quarter Mobile Services Revenue Up 7.4%
text:
BRIEF-Bharti Airtel Says Sept Quarter Mobile Services Revenue Up 7.4%

Stock Markets 23 minutes ago (Oct 29, 2019 20:24)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Bharti Airtel Says Sept Quarter Mobile Services Revenue Up 7.4% Oct 29 (Reuters) - Bharti Airtel Ltd : * SEPT QUARTER ARPU OF 128 RUPEES VERSUS 129 RUPEES IN JUNE QUARTER * SEPT QUARTER MOBILE SERVICES REVENUE OF 108.12 BILLION RUPEES, UP 7.4% * SEPT QUARTER INTERNET DATA CUSTOMER BASE 124.24 MILLION VERSUS 97.67 MILLION IN SEPT LAST YEAR * BOARD APPROVAL OF AUDITED FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR QUARTER ENDED SEPTEMBER 30 DEFERRED TILL NOVEMBER 14 * SEPT QUARTER NET ADDITIONS OF 2.61 MILLION

BRIEF-Bharti Airtel Says Sept Quarter Mobile Services Revenue Up 7.4%
description: BRIEF-Bharti Airtel Says Sept Quarter Mobile Services Revenue Up 7.4%
